section.para: NISP User Information / NISP Introduction / Form to be used for Change Proposals / The NISP in a Windows HTMLHELP file
This version contains the NISP Volumes 1 - 4 plus the Rationale Document (Volume 5) and Annexes (Volume 6) in both html and pdf formats.
For user's convenience in reading pdf files, if not available, a copy of Acrobat reader can be downloaded directly from the internet at .
